lead_paragraph: ISRAEL--Justin. The Officers and Clergy of Temple Israel of the City of New York mourn the passing of long- time member Justin Israel. We extend our heartfelt sympathy to his bereaved wife and family. Andrew Hoffman, President David J. Gelfand, Rabbi 1/3
